Name: Stela of Khons
Description: Oblong rectangular stela with a flat top. The decorated part of the stela is framed by a simple line. Representations and texts are carved, the former with inner detail in relief. There are traces of paint: the skin of the men is reddish brown and the hieroglyphs are light blue. Simple carved lines surround the registers and the lines of text. The inscription sometimes continues over the vertical border. The front surface of the stela was polished, as were the sides. The back was left rather coarsely worked.
